title: Linux pidof Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux pidof command and its practical applications for finding the process ID (PID) of running processes. Learn how to locate multiple processes with the same name and gain insights into system monitoring and management.

meta.title: Linux pidof Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux pidof command and its practical applications for finding the process ID (PID) of running processes. Learn how to locate multiple processes with the same name and gain insights into system monitoring and management.
meta.keywords: Linux, pidof, process ID, PID, system monitoring, process management, command line

verify.name: Verify the pidof command
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `pidof` command to find the PID of the `nginx` process.

steps.title: Find the PID of a Running Process

verify.name: Verify finding the PID of a running process
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `pidof` command to find the PID of the running Python process.

steps.title: Locate Multiple Processes with the Same Name

verify.name: Verify locating multiple processes with the same name
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `pidof` command to find the PIDs of multiple running `nginx` processes.
